search.query: $source_token$ eth_dst=$filteredMAC$ | fields ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, traffic_analyzer_stream, tcp_stream, _* | table ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, traffic_analyzer_stream, tcp_stream
sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource | sort shortSource

| where src_is_private_ip="0" | search [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | where NOT cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src_combined) | dedup eth_src | table eth_src] | where ip_src_combined!="" AND NOT cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src_combined) | fillnull value="" | dedup ip_src_combined | rename ip_src_combined as ip, src_query_name as "DNS Query", src_fqdn as "Reverse Lookup" | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external_endpoints$ | stats sum(frame_len) as "bytes out" by ip_src_combined | rename ip_src_combined as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external_endpoints$ | stats sum(frame_len) as "bytes in" by ip_dst_combined | rename ip_dst_combined as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external_endpoints$ | rename ip_src_combined as ip | where tls_handshake_type=1 | eval client_hello=1 | table client_hello, ip ] | table ip, "DNS Query", "Reverse Lookup", "bytes out", "bytes in" | dedup ip_src_combined | rename ip_src_combined as ip | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | stats sum(frame_len) as b_out by ip_src_combined | rename ip_src_combined as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | stats sum(frame_len) as b_in by ip_dst_combined | rename ip_dst_combined as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | table traffic_analyzer_stream, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, tcp_stream | where tcp_stream!="" | untable traffic_analyzer_stream, type, ip | dedup traffic_analyzer_stream, type | stats count(traffic_analyzer_stream) as "# of Connections" by ip | where ip!="" | table ip, "# of Connections" ] | eval "Traffic In" = b_in/1024, "Traffic Out" = b_out/1024 | table ip, src_query_name, src_fqdn, "Traffic In", "Traffic Out", "# of Connections" | rename ip as "IP", src_query_name as "DNS Name", src_fqdn as "Reverse Lookup" | fillnull value=0
